countryCode.description: The country code of the profile

campaignId.description: The ID of the campaign to which this keyword belongs

keywordText.description: The expression to match against search queries

matchType.description: The match type used to match the keyword to search query

creationDate.description: The date the ad group was created as epoch time in milliseconds

lastUpdatedDate.description: The date the ad group was last updated as epoch time in milliseconds

servingStatus.description: The computed status, accounting for out of budget, policy violations, etc. See developer notes for more information.
